mapper.select: create table if not exists `${tableName}` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `gender` varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '性别，英文，男女', `brand` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '品牌', `category` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '类型', `spu` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '编号', `product_model` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '产品型号', `season` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '季节', `material` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '材质', `color` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '颜色', `size` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '尺寸', `pro_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '商品名称', `foreign_price` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '国外市场价', `domestic_price` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '国内市场价', `sale_price` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '售价', `qty` int(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '5' COMMENT '5有货0无货', `made` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '产地', `description` text COMMENT '描述', `pics` text COMMENT '图片链接', `detail_link` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '商品链接', `sppu_hash` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '商品spu的hash值', `measurement` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '尺寸详情', `supplier_id` varchar(255) DEFAULT '' COMMENT '供应商ID', `supplier_no` varchar(255) DEFAULT '' COMMENT '供应商编号', `supplier_sku_no` varchar(255) DEFAULT '' COMMENT '货物供应商库存编号', `channel` varchar(255) DEFAULT '' COMMENT '渠道域名', `white_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '对应源网站的ID', `create_time` datetime DEFAULT NULL ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间', `update_time` timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `sppu_hash` (`sppu_hash`) USING HASH ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='抓取结果表';
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

description,
pics,

mapper.sql: id, gender, brand, category, spu, product_model, season, material, color, size, pro_name, foreign_price, domestic_price, sale_price, qty, made, detail_link, sppu_hash, measurement, supplier_id, supplier_no, supplier_sku_no, channel, white_id, create_time, update_time,description, pics
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into crawl_result (gender, brand, category, spu, product_model, season, material, color, size, pro_name, foreign_price, domestic_price, sale_price, qty, made, detail_link, sppu_hash, measurement, supplier_id, supplier_no, supplier_sku_no, channel, white_id, create_time, update_time, description, pics ) values (#{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{season,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{material,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foreignPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{domesticPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{salePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{made,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sppuHash,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{measurement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierSkuNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whiteId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{pics,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update crawl_result
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brand = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
category = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
spu = #{spu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_model = #{productModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
season = #{season,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
material = #{material,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
color = #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
size = #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pro_name = #{proName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
foreign_price = #{foreignPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
domestic_price = #{domesticPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sale_price = #{salePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
qty = #{qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
made = #{made,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
detail_link = #{detailLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sppu_hash = #{sppuHash,jdbcType=BIGINT},
measurement = #{measurement,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supplier_no = #{supplierNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supplier_sku_no = #{supplierSkuNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
channel = #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
white_id = #{whiteId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
pics = #{pics,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update crawl_result set gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spu = #{spu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_model = #{productModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, season = #{season,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, material = #{material,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, color = #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, size = #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pro_name = #{proName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, foreign_price = #{foreignPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, domestic_price = #{domesticPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sale_price = #{salePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, qty = #{qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, made = #{made,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail_link = #{detailLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sppu_hash = #{sppuHash,jdbcType=BIGINT}, measurement = #{measurement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplier_no = #{supplierNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplier_sku_no = #{supplierSkuNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channel = #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, white_id = #{whiteId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, pics = #{pics,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
